meanings.definition: Form a mental image or concept of.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys imagining different worlds while reading books.
meanings.sent2: I like imagining what it would be like to fly in a spaceship.
meanings.sent3: He was imagining a talking dog as his new pet.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was imagining a rainbow made of candy.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was so vivid, it felt like imagining stepping into a dream.

meanings.sent1: I am imagining that the sun will shine all day tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She is imagining that her favorite team will win the championship.
meanings.sent3: He keeps imagining that he can fly like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The child was imagining that the moon was made of cheese.
meanings.sent5: Imagining that unicorns exist can bring a sense of magic to life.
